summary: TL* THE CONTACT OWNS A 2013 FORD F-150. WHILE DRIVING 45 MPH, THE MASTER CYLINDER REAR CUP SEAL FRACTURED AND BRAKE FLUID LEAKED INTO THE BRAKE BOOSTER. THE FAILURE OCCURRED ON A CONSISTENT BASIS. THE BRAKE LIGHT ILLUMINATED UNTIL BRAKE FLUID WAS ADDED. THE FAILURE OCCURRED ON JULY 10 2017. AN INDEPENDENT MECHANIC STATED THAT THE MASTER CYLINDER NEEDED TO BE REPLACED. THE FAILURE WAS IDENTICAL TO THE FAILURE LISTED IN NHTSA CAMPAIGN NUMBER: 16V345000 (SERVICE BRAKES, HYDRAULIC); HOWEVER, THE VIN WAS NOT INCLUDED. THE MANUFACTURER ADVISED HIM TO CONTACT THE NHTSA HOTLINE. THE FAILURE MILEAGE WAS 57,193.
